Desc.entry: A registered charity that works in many ways to help promote the rights and welfare of African children. Runs campaigns to raise awareness about issues affecting children and protecting children from harm. Organises conferences and training activities for those who work with children as well as parents about the needs of African children and how to meet those needs. Provides advice to those forming policies on children's issues to help them gain better knowledge about issues in the African community and how they affect children. Runs different projects to help meet the needs of African children and their families. Supports African parents and works with families in crisis. Covers the Sheffield area.
